price: Hakika walio kufuru na wakafa hali ni makafiri, hao iko juu yao laana ya Mwenyezi Mungu na ya Malaika na ya watu wote.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
footnotes: Ama wale walio kakamia na ukafiri, na wakafa bila ya toba wala majuto, jaza yao ni laana ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na Malaika na watu wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū wamātū wahum kuffārun ulāika ʿalayhim laʿnatu al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
